name: jqdock
title: jQuery Dock Menu
description: jqDock is a jQuery plugin that transforms images into a Mac-like Dock menu, with icons that expand on rollover. Configuration allows for : horizontal or vertical alignment, with proportional image expansion from an edge or mid point; positioned labels; different small and large images; size and sensitivity adjustment; initial expansion, instant freeze, inactivity timeouts, and wake-up calls; and more!
